description: Sent after an administrator authentication failure.

event.Summary: Failed web management tool login. Cause: $v1

description: Contains various information about the administrator. This
parameter is used in the adminAccessAuthFailureNotification
event to return the administrator status to a management
system.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::adminAccessInfo

description: Sent after an administrator is successfully authenticated.
Sent at system boot up.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemColdStart COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemProductName s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemFirmwareRevision s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemConfigurationVersion s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemSerialNumber s EXAMPLE

description: HP product name for the device.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemProductName

description: Revision number of the device firmware.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemFirmwareRevision

description: User-defined string to identify the current device
configuration. This string could be anything in printable
ASCII characters.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemConfigurationVersion

description: Device serial number.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemSerialNumber

description: Sent every heartbeatPeriod.

event.Summary: Heartbeat: WAN port IP address:$v3 uptime (sec.):$v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemHeartbeatNotification COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemSerialNumber s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemMacAddress s EXAMPL COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemWanPortIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemUpTime c 9999 IF-MIB::ifOutUcastPkts c 9999 IF-MIB::ifInUcastPkts c 9999 IF-MIB::ifOutErrors c 9999 IF-MIB::ifInErrors c 9999 IF-MIB::ifOutUcastPkts c 9999 IF-MIB::ifInUcastPkts c 9999 IF-MIB::ifOutErrors c 9999 IF-MIB::ifInErrors c 9999 IF-MIB::ifOutUcastPkts c 9999 IF-MIB::ifInUcastPkts c 9999 IF-MIB::ifOutErrors c 9999 IF-MIB::ifInErrors c 9999

description: Device serial number.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemSerialNumber

description: MAC address of the device. This information is
only returned in a systemHeartbeatNotification event.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemMacAddress

description: IP address of the device WAN port. This information is
only returned in a systemHeartbeatNotification event.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemWanPortIpAddress

description: How long the system has been running since its last restart.
When this counter reaches its maximum value, it wraps
around and starts increasing again from zero.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemUpTime

description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols
requested be transmitted, and which were not addressed to a
multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer, including
those that were discarded or not sent.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifOutUcastPkts

description: The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a
higher (sub-)layer, which were not addressed to a multicast
or broadcast address at this sub-layer.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifInUcastPkts

description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound
packets that could not be transmitted because of errors.
For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the
number of outbound transmission units that could not be
transmitted because of errors.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifOutErrors

description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound
packets that contained errors preventing them from being
deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-
oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound
transmission units that contained errors preventing them
from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifInErrors

description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols
requested be transmitted, and which were not addressed to a
multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer, including
those that were discarded or not sent.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifOutUcastPkts

description: The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a
higher (sub-)layer, which were not addressed to a multicast
or broadcast address at this sub-layer.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifInUcastPkts

description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound
packets that could not be transmitted because of errors.
For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the
number of outbound transmission units that could not be
transmitted because of errors.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifOutErrors

description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound
packets that contained errors preventing them from being
deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-
oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound
transmission units that contained errors preventing them
from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifInErrors

description: The total number of packets that higher-level protocols
requested be transmitted, and which were not addressed to a
multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer, including
those that were discarded or not sent.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifOutUcastPkts

description: The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a
higher (sub-)layer, which were not addressed to a multicast
or broadcast address at this sub-layer.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifInUcastPkts

description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound
packets that could not be transmitted because of errors.
For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the
number of outbound transmission units that could not be
transmitted because of errors.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifOutErrors

description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound
packets that contained errors preventing them from being
deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-
oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound
transmission units that contained errors preventing them
from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.
Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at
re-initialization of the management system, and at other
times as indicated by the value of
ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifInErrors

description: Sent after an administrator has logout.
Contains various information about the administrator. This
parameter is used in the adminAccessAuthFailureNotification
event to return the administrator status to a management
system.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::adminAccessInfo

description: Sent when a time server in the system time table is
unreachable.
Specifies the DNS name or IP address of the time server to use.
Setting an entry to a null string will delete the entry.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-SYSTEM-MIB::systemTimeServerAddress
